data.title: A Trust for Rural Educational Development
data.meta_description: A Trust for Rural Educational Development
data.text:
Scouting plays a pivotal role in the holistic development of young minds, fostering leadership skills, teamwork, and a deep connection with nature. We initiated sahasam scout force at chanduluru ZPHS school, Vizianagaram district, Andhra Pradesh. We provided scout kits to the students. Through this initiative, we aim to bridge this gap by providing comprehensive scout…

“Education is the key to unlocking a world of opportunities, and we believe in empowering every student on their academic journey. “ On this Occasion of 75th republic day, Sahasam Trust and with the divine collaboration of sri satya sai universal trust started the “Sadhyam” In an effort to support 10th class Government students, we…

“Sankranti is a time to come together, celebrate the harvest, and share the sweetness of life.” Successfully completed “Mana Uru – Mana Sankranthi” 2024 event. Great efforts from Kotha Chanduluru youth and Naidu Rks for making this event a grand success. As part of this event Sahasam Trust sponsored Rangoli Competitions and kundalu poti competitions…

We proudly announcing Sahasam Trust adopted 25th school in the state of Andhra Pradesh Our founder @ganesh machavarapu visited zph school at lakkavarapu kota and interacted with school students and teachers. We introducing a new program “Vijayapadham”. By this, students will get beneficial through our activities that would enhance the quality of their Education. Our…

We have started the academic this year with the #Swagatham event which will mobilize and encourage parents to join their children in government schools. As part of this event we have conducted rally as well as some fun events as part of this event at vizianagaram, nuziveed. I hope this will help to increase strength…

On this International Women’s Day, our NGO is proud to celebrate the accomplishments and contributions of women by hosting a special event at a Kasthuriba government high school. Our goal is to promote awareness about the importance of gender equality and to inspire young girls to pursue their dreams and goals, regardless of their gender….

Sahasam Trust had the opportunity to partner with the Government primary school, Jyothi Nagar, Bangalore. Our initiative was to interact with the students and to donate the required things requested by them. In addition to this, we had conducted some fun activities. Students were participated with enthusiasm and enjoyed a lot. Our thanks to head…

Around 90 students are visiting our NGO to know about the activities in rural educational development from Meghalaya State, India as a part of their internship program The objectives of this organzation exposure are : Hope students gained exposure from our organization and best wishes to them. #DareEnoughtoServe.

Happiness is creating hope in someone’s life…The whole world grappling with the global pandemic of Covid-19. As a small act of service, sahasam trust identified 180 poor families , disabled persons around the villages of vizianagaram district and helped them some groceries for 1 month.Our special thanks to Sahasam state legal advisor sri Adada Mohana…

Sahasam Trust releases the results of SPARKS 2020 which was conducted on 15th Febraury 2020. Students can check the result in official website http://www.saahasam.co.in/sparks.html Our special thanks to our beloved M.E.O @kurma Rao Chalumuri garu , Sahasam Education advisor Venu gopal Garu and other invitees for releasing the results. #SPARKS2020#DareEnoughtoServe

Sahasam Trust struggling to reopen the closed government schools (Chandhuluru, K.Marlapalli) from 4 years. Initially, sahasam trust requested mandal level, district level educational departments and official public representives (MPP, ZPTC, MLA) to reopen the schools but couldnt make it happen because of regualtions of government. Students suffering alot to go to other schools as they…

గ్రంధాలయ_ప్రారంభోత్సవం #మన_పల్లె_కోసం“To build up a library is to create a life. It’s never just a random collection of books. On this occasion of children’s day, Sahasam Trust started a special program ” Mana Palle Kosam (మన పల్లె కోసం) ” in deekshitula agraharam, k.kotapadu, visakhapatnam District, A. P.
